description.en: Peculiarities of social datafication (what does datafication mean in the society, in the organisations and on the individual level); what kind of data and how could be used on behalf of organisation or community (including developments related to 'data activism'), what interpretational issues should be taken into account, when encountering analysis using large-scale data (paradigm shifts, sample representativeness issues, privacy and ethics, challenges to methods and analysis techniques, examples about the implementation, e.g. social network analysis, mobile positioning, social media and measuring opinions, register data, etc).
description.et: Andmestumise eripärad (mida andmestumine tähendab ühiskonnas, organisatsiooni ja indiviidi tasandil);  milliseid andmeid ja kuidas saab organisatsiooni või kogukonna heaks kasutada (mh 'data activism' arengud), milliste tõlgendusprobleemidega tuleks arvestada, kui puututakse kokku suurandmeid kasutanud analüüsidega (paradigmaatilised nihked, valimi esinduslikkuse probleemid, privaatsus ja eetika, väljakutsed meetoditele ja analüüsitehnikatele, näited suurandmete rakendusvaldkondadest, nt sotsiaalsete võrgustike analüüs, mobiilpositsioneerimine, sotsiaalmeedia ja hoiakute mõõtmine, registriandmed jm).

objectives.en: To give and overview about actual theoretical and methodological issues related to analyse and usage of big data in social sciences.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade sotsiaalteaduslike suurandmete analüüsi ja kasutamisega seotud aktuaalsetest teoreetilistest ja metodoloogilistest probleemidest.

learning_outcomes.en: 1) can broadly explain, what does mean and what challenges are related to social datafication (e.g. including development of 'data-driven' culture);
learning_outcomes.et: 1) oskab üldjoontes selgitada, mida tähendab ja milliseid arenguväljakutseid esitab ühiskonna andmestumine (mh 'data-driven' kultuuri areng);

learning_outcomes.en: 2) orientates in main thematic topis related to social big data and social datafication (e.g. on the individual, organisational and societal level);
learning_outcomes.et: 2) orienteerub sotsiaalteaduslike suurandmetega ja andmestumisega seotud peamistes teemades (nt indiviidi, organisatsioon, ühiskonna tasandil);

learning_outcomes.en: 3) can critically estimate possible methodological, theoretical and interpretational issues related to analyses using social scientific big data;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab kriitiliselt hinnata võimalikke metodoloogilisi,  teoreetilisi ja tõlgenduslikke probleeme sotsiaalteaduslikke suurandmeid kasutanud analüüsides;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) can decide, which data could be used for offering solutions for societal issues and what are the limitations of these data sources.
learning_outcomes.et: 4) oskab otsustada, milliseid andmeid saab lahenduste väljatöötamisel kasutada, mis on nende andmete kasutamise piirangud.

independent_work.et:
During the course, students have to submit small coursework before each seminar and one bigger groupwork. 

More detailed information about the coursework is on Moodle.

description.et:
Short analytical forum posts related to the course topics (4)
-All post have to be submitted before deadline
-Analytical posts are all related to assigned reading and assigned reading have to be cited in the analysis
-Post need to include additional materials chosen by the student
Other requirements in Moodle

Groupwork - Research paper based on the chosen topic
-10-15 pages in lenght
-should be submitted before deadline
-has to accompany chosen visualisation
-Additional requirements in Moodle

grade_preconditions.et: All mandatory coursework has to be submitted and graded positively by the teacher.

grade_evaluation.et:
1) Four short forum assignments (20p) submitted after the seminars
2)Final project - group assignment (40p) 

To pass the course, students need to collect at least 45 points.
